thread.title: Full list of winners at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards

title: Full list of winners at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards
text:
Full list of winners at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards Full list of winners at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The best acts in hip hop were honoured at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards in Atlanta, Georgia. 
Kendrick Lamar and Big Sean took away the most gongs on the night. J. Cole won Best Live Perfomer & Album Of The Year at the #BETHipHopAwards pic.twitter.com/9VQeWo4E9v 
‚Äî Only Hip Hop Facts (@OnlyHipHopFacts) October 14, 2015 
Here‚Äôs the full list of winners: 
Best Club Banger: Big Sean feat. E-40 ‚Äì IDFWU Wow IDFWU 1st award of the night! thank u @BET n thank u to the real fans riding 4 me. So mad I couldn't be there but jus know we workin üôè 
‚Äî Big Sean (@BigSean) October 14, 2015 
Who Blew Up Award: Fetty Wap 
‚Äî #HipHopAwards (@HipHopAwards) October 14, 2015 
Album of the Year: J. Cole ‚Äì 2014 Forest Hills Drive So happy that finally J. Cole got some recognition for his greatness.. A lyrical genius right there #BETHipHopAwards #AlbumOfTheYear üíØüíØ 
‚Äî Amelia Smith (@melzsmitty) October 14, 2015 
Best Hip Hop Video: Kendrick Lamar ‚Äì Alright 
MVP of the Year: Drake Drake won MVP of the year at the #BETHipHopAwards pic.twitter.com/KCeuHuJ94r 
‚Äî Only Hip Hop Facts (@OnlyHipHopFacts) October 14, 2015 
Lyricist of the Year: Kendrick Lamar 
Track of the Year: Trap Queen ‚Äì Produced by Tony Fadd (performed by Fetty Wap) 
Best Live Performer: J. Cole 
Best Collbaration, Duo or Group: Big Sean feat. Drake and Kanye West ‚Äì Blessings 
Video Director of the Year: Benny Boom 
People‚Äôs Champ Award: Big Sean feat. Drake and Kanye West ‚Äì Blessings 
DJ of the Year: DJ Mustard Tune in tonight!! I‚Äôm taking on the @HipHopAwards at 8/7C on @BET ! #HipHopAwards 
‚Äî Dj mustard (@DJmustard) October 13, 2015 
Producer of the Year: DJ Mustard 
Hustler of the Year: Dr Dre 
Made-you-look Award: Dej Loaf 
Best Mixtape: Future ‚Äì 56 Nights 
Sweet 16: Best Featured Verse: Drake ‚Äì My Way Remix (Fetty Wap feat. Drake) 
‚Äî Sean Diddy Combs (@iamdiddy) October 13, 2015 
Impact Track: Kendrick Lamar ‚Äì Alright Share article
